DOC.brief_title: Effect of Vitamin C on Postoperative Pain After Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of this study is to evaluate the effect of Vitamine C supplements to be helpful to reduce the postoperative pain after laparoscopic cholecystectomy through the double-blinded randomized controlled trial. The primary purpose of this study is to confirm the reduce of postoperative pain through the oral supplement of Vitamine C before and after the surgery. For this purpose, we compared the dosage or counts of opioids usage with the oral supplement of Vitamine C or not. The secondary purpose is to assess the pain score, postoperative morbidities, postoperative length of stay or postoperative time between two groups.
